Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Unfortunately we have no good news for you. We had to reject a promising deal at the last moment. The deal would have allowed us to start our project in full and to finish the Token Sale successful, but unfortunately we couldn't accept the deal. We will not reach our minimum token sale target. We will send back all the funds in the next 48 hours which were paid into our project. We are really sorry and we want to apologize.

Author: Crypto Girl
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: What if someone dreamed of having his or her car and got to know about your project but he or she doesn't had any knowledge about the cryptocurrencies, how could it be possible for him or her to fulfill that dream thru your project if this person did not have any knowledge about the crypto.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That is a good question. The goal is to make our application as easy as possible to use. That also people who aren't familiar with cryptocurrencies can use our platform. We think with a good enough interface, they don't need to have much knowledge at all. We will also release some step by step guides.

We think many people would be more open to the blockchain technology and cryptocurrencies if they understood it.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: To expect people to understand blockchain to use a platform based on it, is like expecting everyone who drives a car to know the specifics of a combustion engine. It's just not necessary for most people to understand how everything works. This is how our society can accomplish everything it has. People specialize in certain things, so other people don't have to.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Theoretically, a company is always worth as much as someone is willing to pay for it. In practice, there is also an ideal value and another point is, the owners also have to want to sell the company or their idea. Therefore we can not quantify the value with any number.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive

Body: What would you say has been the biggest milestone you guys have hit so far?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: The milestones we have achieved so far are the prototype, the complete white paper and the on-time planning. These may not be any major milestones, but they are all necessary to start a project successfully and with a view to the future. Another very important milestone is our token sale which starts on Sunday 10th of December.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]

Author: Hullo
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: According to information from opening page crowd sale is going to start in two days. I was reading at large about the concept to catch up with the idea that how it will work. It looks very interesting because of the aspects its covers and features it is offering through this project.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Nice, you guys are coming along very well.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: And if there's a huge demand, would you buy more? Like 50?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: For sure. There is theoretically no limit. But practically it depends on the market cap, the demand and the liquidity of our token on how much vehicles we can provide to the marketplace. We strive for a healthy growth.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Since you determine the list, you would choose where the vehicles would be? How would you manage vehicles on your list in another country?

Author: Dofus
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I imagine with the initial list of cars there will be a variety, or do you think it would be more profitable to focus on a certain kind of vehicle?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes, we would choose where they would be in the beginning. We start with Switzerland. To our luck, Switzerland is not extremely huge in terms of area, so when we start we have a good control. Later it is the goal that we build locations in the different countries in which we are active. So we have a good overview and only vehicles are listed, which are suitable for our market place.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: At the start there will be only a few kind of vehicles. From our point of view, it makes more sense to build one after the other than to start with various things at the same time. As we grow and have new partners, diversity will expand and there will be more kind of vehicles available.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Okay, so the cars would all be rented out from a chain of rental stores eventually? Would the place be called CrowdDrive?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: How big do you think the market opportunity is?

Author: Coin_trader
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: It's a very good project as i have read the OP, it will help those ordinary people to have their dream car in the sense that he must be a crypto enthusiast to understand the blockchain and the cryptocurrencies but how about if the person doesn't have an awareness about the blokchain and the cryptos, will you have a team that will "educate" them about the cryptos and blockchain for them to be eligible to join this project?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes, it will be more or less like this. The marketplace will be called CrowdDrive that is sure. How we will call the rental service and car garage is not 100% sure yet.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: It is huge. In Switzerland the car industry makes a turnover of almost 90 billion USD per year. And there is no similar concept at the moment.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Thank you for your comment. That is an important point you address. So that it is possible to participate in our project with a basic understanding of blockchain and cryptocurrencies, we will create step by step instructions. And to educate them that they understand exactly how blockchain and cryptocurrencies work we thought of working with experts who can teach them with online courses and webinars.

Author: SeaSoul
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Although decentralization of ownership in this area can also cause a lot of problems in my opinion. It's difficult for a person living on the other side of the world to make sure that the profit at the end of the month really is the correct profit or whether the cars are sustainably and sufficiently managed. I do see the potential but also a lot of uncertainties. For sure worth the experiment!

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Okay, would you eventually be franchising these locations out?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: It makes sense to start small and scale. Do you think you will be able to scale up quick enough to accommodate the demand?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Thank you for your comment. It's a challenge that's right. But we have already thought about this topic. We want to be as transparent as possible. We will, of course, disclose the purchase receipt of the vehicles, repair bills and so on for shareholders of the cars. Additionally, for safety reasons, rental vehicles are always equipped with GSP. This gives the opportunity to release the GSP data with a delay of, for example, 24 hours for the shareholders, so that they also see that the vehicle is being moved. The 24 hour delay or more would serve to secure the privacy of the tenants. In the future, it will also be easy to save all receipts in the blockchain and release them only for the shareholders of the respective vehicles. In the end, of course, trust is needed.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That would be an option. Working together with already established rental services and garages is also possible.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: The Token Sale starts 10. December and it will end 10. January 2018.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: The idea is to provide cars to the marketplace to get growth capital. It will not always be 100% of a car available for participation. This depends on the age, vehicle type, value of the vehicle and other factors. That’s how it is possible for CrowdDrive and other providers to compensate for potential losses. As an example if a rental car needs to be repaired and downtimes arise. For car garages and car rental services this is an opportunity to grow their business. Car rental services can sell cars to the marketplace they already own. With the new capital they can buy new cars and like that they can offer a bigger selection of cars to their costumers.  It is possible to start other applications as you can see in the Announcement thread like Taxis, delivery service and so on. But we can't build it without capital and everybody who helps to build the company will get his share of the profit.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I tried to translate it but I do not quite understand what you mean. Can you please write your question in English?

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Wise words. Anything you're passionate about at the moment besides CrowdDrive? I imagine there's not much time for anything else with how busy you must be.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Seems like they're a little all over the place. They said they liked the project, and they want to know who will determine the list of vehicles people can invest in. Also whether or not shareholders will advertise?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: At the moment not. And before CrowdDrive it was nearly the same I was passionated about, cars and cryptocurrency. That is right there is not much time for other things but I try to do sport weekly it is a good balance.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Thank you for the translation.  We will determine the vehicle list. If other providers wants to provide their vehicles to the marketplace we will check everything and if it looks good we will list their vehicles on our marketplace. Shareholders do not have to advertise.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive

Body: I would say it is Elon Musk. He is a crazy guy with crazy ideas and he does not stop until he is finished. It is really impressive what he achieved and how he changes the world.

Author: Blackwhite69
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: So there seems to be no certainty for the marjor exchange market?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We can't promise it. We will do our best to get to major exchanges but all in good time and when we are ready. Step by step.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: This would be a possibility with your technology right?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I'm actually impressed with how far ahead you guys are thinking. This is a very good sign.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes this would be possible provided that all participants live in the same region and there are 100% of the car available for participation. If there is demand, we will of course find a solution so we can offer this service.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Tobias, it says in your profile you had a business in Switzerland? That was your care rental business?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: No, it was a business in another area. We sold electronics. This is about 3 years ago and it was before I got to know the blockchain technology. It was a good experience.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I can't seem to find a road map on the site or original post, do you guys have one?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes we have a road map I added it to the announcement post and you can also find it in the Whitepaper. We will publish a more detailed one when the Token Sale is finished.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Okay. What would you say was the most important thing you learned from that experience?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Okay nice, thanks. I see it now. Any big changes to it you can share now?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: It is possible to make your hobby a profession. It's not easy as an entrepreneur but it's worth it. And we got to know the market and the possible difficulties.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Nothing we can share at the moment. It depends also on the result of the Token Sale. Depending on this, some things are implemented faster or planned applications are implemented from the beginning.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yesterday we have tested our smart contract on the Kovan Test Net and everything worked fine.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's an awesome lesson. I think those who are able to turn a hobby into a profession not only enjoy it more, but also end up doing a better job than those who aren't passionate about the field.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That seems understandable. Thank you for your prompt and helpful responses.

Author: Crislyn4116
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: This is an incredible i dea i want a sports car

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes I think so too. If you love what you do. You will always give 100% even if it is not easy at some points.

Author: SeaSoul
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Are those cars used for normal driving and stuff or do you tokens represent ownership in cars as an asset class, for example like old-timers and other collectors stuff?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: These cars will be rented, leased and resold. If you have shares of a rental car as an example you get your part of the generated profit once a month and you are also free to sell your shares at anytime on the marketplace to other interested buyers. In the future there are also more applications than renting, leasing and reselling the cars possible. You find more about it in our Whitepaper or in the Announcement post. The tokens does not represent ownership. Our token is the only accepted currency to buy shares on our marketplace.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: What happens to any unsold tokens?

Author: Dofus
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's great, exactly what I was looking for!

Author: scam confirmed
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Sounds about right. What kind of limits on vehicles are there? Can I invest in large construction vehicles, like dump trucks?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We have talked to a legal firm. It is a utility token that makes it easier for us and some critical countries are not allowed to participate in the sale.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: There will be no unsold tokens. The smart contract will only mint as much token as we have sold.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We will start with normal cars. And then we will add step by step new categories. Our target is that you can invest in any kind of vehicle one day.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: New ICO Calendar listings:  http://bitcoinchaser.com/ico-hub/upcoming-icos https://icoholder.com/en/ico/crowddrive-16783

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: How did you come up with the idea for this, one of the founders works in car rentals?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's great, so all clear as far as regulations go?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We are all car lovers. We have rented some sport cars several times and we also know a lot of people who own car rental services. The big dream of every car guy is to own his dream car one day but unfortunately, that remains a dream for a lot of car guys. Then we had the idea why not own a small part of a car respectively of your dream car, make money with it and in the best case buy your dream car with the profits made.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes everything is clear. We have future changes and regulations in view.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We are finally a Jr. Member. Now you can see our pictures and it should be easier to understand our project.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: New ICO calendar and apps listing:  https://icoarray.com/ico/crowddrive http://www.icoalarmapp.com/ http://icoshowroom.com/ http://icolert.com/ ICO Pro - Crypto Calendar and Alerts

Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's a nice story, I guess you could also treat it like a time-share if you wanted. Everyone pays 1/52nd of the total cost, say $200k for a Ferrari which comes to $3800 apiece and they get to drive a Ferrari for a week every year lol. You could always sell your share too.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Can you go into any detail about future regulations you'll have to deal with?

Author: juarezweiss
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's an awesome project, guys! I'm enrolled for the bounty campaign, it looks really promising!  Good luck, and to the moon! 🚀

Author: Kenway
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: sir ,i want to ask a question how long will your project hit marjor exchange market after crowd-sale end?

Author: erick94
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: this project is very good and I think just waiting for success. I think this project has in common with cartaxi. hopefully the results of this project more satisfying and successful.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Sure. In our main sector the vehicle sector there is at the moment no direct regulation. But we think it is possible that in 10 to 20 years there will be a regulation on cars with internal combustion engines. Some countries already have regulations, as an example on which cars can drive in a big city. Also there will be regulations on self driving vehicles. We think the whole vehicle market will change in the next maybe 10 up to 15 years.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Hard to say. Our goal is to be listed on the first exchange in the following month of the Token Sale. But we can't promise any date. How long it will takes until we are listed on a major exchange depends also on the result of our Token Sale. If you have a bigger market cap it is easier to get listed on a major exchange because then it is more lucrative for the exchange. For sure we do our best to get listed as soon as possible without losing focus on the project and the development of our platform. Because we want to build our project long term and it will not help anyone if we are listed quickly but the project is not going forward.

Author: HealthSecurities
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: This idea actually sounds pretty cool but I feel like it's just a shared car renting company. Dont think there will be much profit off it.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Thank you for your input. At the beginning of the project that is true we will be a shared car renting/participation platform where all car garages and car rental services can provide their cars for participation but we have also some pretty cool ideas for the future. But we have to start somewhere and we don‘t need a few hundred millions USD and we don’t promsie you something that isn‘t feasible in the next few years like some other ICO‘s. Do you think car garages and car rental services would exist if there is no good profit? For car garages and car rental services this is an opportunity to grow their business. Car rental services can sell cars to the marketplace they already own. With the new capital they can buy new cars and like that they can offer a bigger selection of cars to their costumers.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: It doesn't have to be solely for renting. Anything you can do in a car to make money, you could do with this platform. If enough people adopt this, we could run taxi companies, food delivery companies, general delivery companies etc. out of business, and instead of 1 guy being paid hundreds of millions it'd be split between all the co-owners.

Author: Dofus
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Especially since I watched a documentary recently about a company making a self driving kit available on Amazon for $1,000, coming out in 2018 supposedly. Combine anything you just named, with a self driving car and that's where the real money is.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Is your token considered a security or a utility?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: It is a utility token. It does not provide any right to the company or something else. It is needed that you can use the full functionality of our platform.

Author: CapKirk
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Why will the token price go up? E.g. car price goes down as it depreciates..

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: You will get car shares in exchange of CAR tokens. The tokens are not tied to the car shares which you have bought. We are working on how we will provide the car shares to the participants. At the moment it looks like we will issue a new token for every car we provide to the marketplace. So you get as an example "Audi A3 ID3212" tokens in exchange of your CAR token. The advantages of providing a new token is that everything is visible in the blockchain. The only accepted payment method to buy car shares on our marketplace is our CAR token. We will provide the CAR tokens we will get in exchange of the car shares back to an exchange that they are back in circulation. When we are better known and everybody can see that our platform works more people want to buy car shares and then the demand for the token will rise.  We will update our Whitepaper and the announcement thread this week, that everybody has a better understanding how it will works and what future applications could be.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Will you be doing anything to prevent traders from dumping your tokens as soon as it's listed on an exchange?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: This is good news, thanks for taking the time to respond.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's good, it annoys me to no end when new Platforms come out and you go their site and it just directs you to download a mobile app.

Author: Dofus
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Do you have any sort of prototypes at this point, or is it still way too early?

Author: scam confirmed
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: So with the broad use of a token like this, who exactly are you trying to target? Investors? Entrepreneurs?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: It is hard to prevent dumping. We will work hard and we will do our best that they don't want to dump their token as soon as our token is listed. Our goal is to make a good development in the long term view.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes we have an InVision prototype of our mobile application you can find it here: https://invis.io/BGEC30J97#/262525582_CrowdDrive_Homescreen We are working on the UI and UX of the mobile application and we will update the prototype periodically.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: At the beginning we want to target investors, who want to invest in vehicles. Once our platform is established, our target audience are also entrepreneurs who want to use our platform to grow their business.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Update:  We have updated our Whitepaper and announcement thread. We hope that it is clearer now what is possible and where we want to go with our project.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yeah I guess that's about all you can do.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Is there a certain firm you've contracted to go over the legal aspects?

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I'd make that investment today if I could. It's all profit after the 1st year, and then after 2.5 you turn around and make another good bit of money selling it.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's interesting. I've never seen that in the US. I'm surprised too, because it makes sense that they would.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: My thoughts exactly. Now I need to invest in a mechanic shop / used car lot lol. They go hand in hand, you'd think.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I've seen some shops in the states that offer loaners, mostly in bigger cities.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: How much has been invested into CrowdDrive in total?

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Are there any other similar tokens/ICOs out there?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Do you mean from investors or from our team?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We don't know about any similar tokens or ICO's at the moment. There are a few ICO's, which work like Uber respectively Lyft. And we know about one ICO which has a project in the similar direction, but there your investment is tied for 5 up to 15 years.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Update:  New ICO Calendar Listings: https://www.smithandcrown.com/icos/ https://icotracker.net/project/crowd_drive

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Are you looking for more advisors?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I originally meant from the team, but both would be good to know.

Author: Dofus
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Any?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We can't say an exact number. But we are working on the project a long time and since 4 months I work full time on this project. That is also part of the investment.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We don't know of any big investor at the moment who will get a big part of all tokens. We will see if this will change until the token sale starts.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Time is definitely an investment. How many people are on the team anyway?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: At the moment we are two people who are working full time for the project and we also have people who support the project if we need their help.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: After the ICO do you plan to bring more people in full time?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes that is the plan. But at the start we try to launch our mobile application as fast as possible and then we are also willing to work with other companies to achive the best results. Because it is not easy to find good employes in a short period of time.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: How much of the platform will be focused on the mobile app? Will there a be a web based one?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Of course there will be a web based platform. We are focusing more on the mobile application because it should be easy to use our marketplace on every device and a lot of people these days are using mobile phones. But the web based platform is also important. We will release the web based platform befor we release the mobile application.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That is exactly where we want to go. To start and grow the business we will start with a car rental service and reselling the cars. In the future when there are fully autonomous cars the whole car market will change. And with our solution it doesn't matter where you live. You can live in Germany and own a part of a taxi in New York that works for you 24 hours a day. And you don't have to worry about maintenance because we will do the work for you.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I wonder just how much profit there could be with a single self driving taxi?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Depends on the country, availability, capacity and a lot of other circumstances. You can't say an exact percentage at the moment. With our sport car rental we calculate to amortize a car in one year. That would be a profit of up to 10% per month. This is only a calculation and can't be guaranteed.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Seems like too many factors to try to estimate this. How many people decided to keep their cars vs. use automated taxis? How much competition is there driving down price? How big is the city resulting in higher demand? Just so many factors.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Right there are a lot of factors in the case of automated taxis. We think until there are automated taxis it may takes a few years. At the moment we concentrate to do our business now with the the current technology. We have new technologies in view and we will adapt to them if needed.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: And your current technologies mostly concentrates on renting/leasing vehicles?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Right at the beginning we will provide cars to our marketplace on which everybody can participate who owns CAR token. We will rent, lease or resell the cars to make a profit for all shareholders of the car. The next step is to open our marketplace to other car garages and rental services. They can also provide their cars to the marketplace. At the end it doesn't matter if it is an automated car, a sport car or any other car.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: That's very true. How about a rental car, do you guys have estimates on it?

Author: MustDream
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Great idea! But what's gonna hapen when you will buy lambo for yourself?

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Rent that baby out with some heavy duty insurance!

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: This isn't going to happen. We will buy a sport car probably a Lamborghini for the business to rent it to our costumers. We want to build a long term business and if we buy a Lamborghini for ourselves we don't build a long term business. You can also meet us in Switzerland and have a look at our progress. If we want to ride a sport car will be our own costumers. When the marketplace is ready and opened to all car garages and sport car rentals you aren't depending on a provider.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: So once it's open to other car garages and rental services, they'll sell shares of the cars they already have, or even increase their fleet with the help of token buyers?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Both they can sell shares of the cars they already have to get growth capital or to increase their fleet. I depends if they are car garages or rental services. Rental services have the need to increase their fleet that they have a bigger offer for their costumers.

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Any estimates? How long would it take to pay off the investment?

Author: Dofus
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Any big investors on board that you know of?

Author: sayedtaha
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: dear all here is the Arabic translation of the ANN thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2398384.new#new

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: We have estimated that it will take about 12-15 months to pay of the investment on a rental car depending on the car. And you also have your shares that you can trade until the rental car is sold or we have to replace it. We can use a rental car up to 2.5 years or 200‘000 km. So the investment is paid off even faster. If you buy shares of a car that will be resold or leased you get your profit when the car is sold.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: When you say car garages, you mean like mechanics shops? This would be a great way for them to easily get into renting out cars to their customers who are having their vehicles fixed.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes we mean also mechanics shops. In Switzerland mechanics shops normaly also sell cars. Right they can grow with our platform and offer new services.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Thank you we will update the spreadsheet.

Body: This project is incredible in my opinion. Maybe this project will be successful in the future.

Author: dee838

Body: Very gud idea, do u planing for any bounties?

Author: yokosan
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Nice and different project. I do not know how you will work. but the share of vehicle sales will be split among shareholders. I hope you will succeed. who will determine the vehicle list. Will shareholders advertise?

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Thank you for your comment.  We will determine the vehicle list. We will buy the vehicles and provide it to our marketplace. You only buy shares of the vehicles and we will do the rest. And every time a profit is made you will get your share of the profit. You don't have to advertise as a shareholder but if you like our work and you want to recommend us we would be happy.

Author: Tobias-CrowdDrive
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yes of course we have a bounty program. You can find it here https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2361919.0

Author: Dipsomaniac
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: I could actually see something like this being very useful in the future.

Author: earthcoin
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Yeah, anyone who really knows the future of automobiles knows the amount of people who own a car is going to start dropping drastically when fully autonomous vehicles come.

Author: deeltje
Title: [ANN][ICO]
Body: Exactly, because who really needs a car to sit unused 22 hours a day? Better to call a self driving taxi for super cheap. I could see CrowdDriving being very useful in this scenario. A group comes together and invests in a car, and they set it up to taxi around the city 24 hours a day and split the profit, and there would be lots of profit.
